author: Kaloyan Bozhkov
name: linkbase
description: Personal database for managing connections - Full-stack TypeScript application

scripts.build: pnpm run build:backend && pnpm run build:app
scripts.build:backend: pnpm db:generate && cd backend && pnpm run build
scripts.type-check: pnpm run type-check:backend && pnpm run type-check:app
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:backend && pnpm run lint:app
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:backend && pnpm run clean:app
scripts.vercel-build: pnpm db:generate && cd backend && pnpm build
